text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Partnership funding" means money granted from the Substance Abuse Treatment Outcomes Partnership Fund to match local funding.
"Proposal" means a plan under this subtitle to provide new or expanded substance abuse treatment services.

"Request for Partnership funding" means a proposal, submitted by the governing bodies of one or more jurisdictions, to provide substance abuse treatment services to one or more eligible populations within the requesting jurisdiction or jurisdictions.
